name: who
explanation: thay thế cho người, làm chủ ngữ trong mệnh đề quan hệ.
example:
I need to meet the boy. The boy is my son's friend. 

-> I need to meet the bot who is my son's friend.

name: whom
explanation: Thay thế cho người, làm tân ngữ trong mệnh đề quan hệ.
example:
I know the girl. I spoke to this girl 

-> I know the girl whom I spoke to.

name: which
explanation: Thay thế cho vật, đồ vật, làm chủ ngữ, tân ngữ trong mệnh đề quan hệ.
example:
She works for a company. It makes cars. 

-> She works for a company which makes cars.

name: that
explanation: Thay thế cho người, vật làm chủ ngữ, tân ngữ trong mệnh đề quan hệ.
example:
I need to meet the boy that is my friend's son. 

I know the girl that I spoke to.

name: whose
explanation: Thay thế cho sở hữu của người, vật (his, her, its, their)
example:
John found the cat. Its leg was broken. 

-> John found the cat whose leg was broken.

name: where
explanation: Thay thé cho cụm từ chỉ nơi chốn (there, at that plae).
example:
The movie theater is the place. We go there once a week. 

-> The movie theater is the place where we go once a week.

name: why
explanation: Thay thế cho cụm trạng từ chỉ lí do : for that reason.
example:
Tell me the reason. You are so sad for that reason. 

-> Tell me the reason why you are so sad.

name: when
explanation: Thay thế cho cụm từ chỉ thời gian : then, at that time, on that day.
example:
Do you remember the day. We first met on that day. 

-> Do you remember the day when we first met.
